", "answer": "Financial Support Scheme for Farm Mechanization (FSSM) by the Agriculture Department, Government of West Bengal aims to provide financial support as subsidy to the small and marginal farmers of the State for purchase of power operated farm equipment/ machinery.

"}]}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}], "process_md": "> **Registration Process:**

**Step 01:** Visit the official FMS [portal ](https://wbfms. matirkatha. net/applicants/sign_up)and click on “New Registration”. 
**Step 02:** Fill in all the mandatory details in “Applicant Registration” form.
